Notes

Second pressing issued by Matador after the first pressing was recalled due to a copyright claim by Ric Ocasek. Gatefold sleeve. Includes a download code and printed inner sleeves. ℗ & © 2016 Matador Records Recorded at Soundhouse and Avast! studios. "The Ballad Of The Costa Concordia" contains lyrics and elements of the song "White Flag" written by F. Armstrong, R. Armstrong, and R. Nowels. Future Furniture, Universal Music-MGB Songs & Warner Chappell Music Inc (ASCAP)
